description: Retrieves the definition of a security control. The definition includes the control title, description, Region availability, parameter definitions, and other details.

parameters.name: SecurityControlId
parameters.description: The ID of the security control to retrieve the definition for. This field doesn't accept an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: SecurityControlDefinition
nested_items.description: Provides metadata for a security control, including its unique standard-agnostic identifier, title, description, severity, availability in Amazon Web Services Regions, and a link to remediation steps.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of a security control across standards. Values for this field typically consist of an Amazon Web Services service name and a number (for example, APIGateway.3). This parameter differs from SecurityControlArn, which is a unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned to a control. The ARN references the security control ID (for example, arn:aws:securityhub:eu-central-1:123456789012:security-control/APIGateway.3).

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of a security control.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of a security control across standards. This typically summarizes how Security Hub evaluates the control and the conditions under which it produces a failed finding. This parameter doesn't reference a specific standard.

nested_items.name: RemediationUrl
nested_items.description: A link to Security Hub documentation that explains how to remediate a failed finding for a security control.

nested_items.name: SeverityRating
nested_items.description: The severity of a security control. For more information about how Security Hub determines control severity, see Assigning severity to control findings in the Security Hub User Guide.

nested_items.name: CurrentRegionAvailability
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a security control is available in the current Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: CustomizableProperties
nested_items.description: Security control properties that you can customize. Currently, only parameter customization is supported for select controls. An empty array is returned for controls that don't support custom properties.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ParameterDefinitions
nested_items.description: An object that provides a security control parameter name, description, and the options for customizing it. This object is excluded for a control that doesn't support custom parameters.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of a control parameter.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationOptions
nested_items.description: The options for customizing a control parameter. Customization options vary based on the data type of the parameter.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a control parameter that is an integer.

nested_items.name: Min
nested_items.description: The minimum valid value for a control parameter that is an integer.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum valid value for a control parameter that is an integer.

nested_items.name: IntegerList
nested_items.description: The options for customizing a security control parameter that is a list of integers.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a control parameter that is a list of integers.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: Min
nested_items.description: The minimum valid value for a control parameter that is a list of integers.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum valid value for a control parameter that is a list of integers.

nested_items.name: MaxItems
nested_items.description: The maximum number of list items that an interger list control parameter can accept.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a control parameter that is a double.

nested_items.name: Min
nested_items.description: The minimum valid value for a control parameter that is a double.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum valid value for a control parameter that is a double.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a control parameter that is a string.

nested_items.name: Re2Expression
nested_items.description: An RE2 regular expression that Security Hub uses to validate a user-provided control parameter string.

nested_items.name: ExpressionDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the RE2 regular expression.

nested_items.name: StringList
nested_items.description: The options for customizing a security control parameter that is a list of strings.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a control parameter that is a list of strings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Re2Expression
nested_items.description: An RE2 regular expression that Security Hub uses to validate a user-provided list of strings for a control parameter.

nested_items.name: MaxItems
nested_items.description: The maximum number of list items that a string list control parameter can accept.

nested_items.name: ExpressionDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the RE2 regular expression.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a boolean parameter.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a control parameter that is an enum.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The valid values for a control parameter that is an enum.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The Security Hub default value for a control parameter that is a list of enums.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MaxItems
nested_items.description: The maximum number of list items that an enum list control parameter can accept.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The valid values for a control parameter that is a list of enums.
(string) ---
